scripts.name: DNS checks
scripts.code:
$d=(Get-CimInstance Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain
Get-DnsClientServerAddress -AddressFamily IPv4
Resolve-DnsName -Type SRV _ldap._tcp.dc._msdcs.$d -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

scripts.name: DNS checks
scripts.code:
$d=(Get-CimInstance Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain
Get-DnsClientServerAddress -AddressFamily IPv4
Resolve-DnsName -Type SRV _ldap._tcp.dc._msdcs.$d -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
